name: SeaMonster Studios
description:
Based in Seattle, WA, SeaMonster Studios is a lean and limber group of designers, developers, marketers, team players, technologists, and strategists. More than any of that, our clients call us partners.
We approach each project with thoughtfulness and attention to detail. Our clientsâ€™ satisfaction is as important to us as the performance of their project. Our work runs the gamut, but each project shares a commitment to getting it right and trying something new.
